name: Server
description: Server represents all Server controls in the Server side.

static_functions.name: ChangeMap
static_functions.description: Restarts the server in a new Map, restarts all packages and reconnects all players

static_functions.name: LoadPackage
static_functions.description: Loads a Package

static_functions.name: ReloadPackage
static_functions.description_long:
Reloads a Package
Note: the package is effectively reloaded in the next server tick

static_functions.name: UnloadPackage
static_functions.description: Unloads a Package
static_functions.description_long:
Unloads a Package
Note: the package is effectively unloaded in the next server tick

static_functions.name: SetDescription
static_functions.description: Sets the description of the server, optionally overrides Config.toml

static_functions.name: SetLogo
static_functions.description: Sets the logo of the server, optionally overrides Config.toml

static_functions.name: SetMaxPlayers
static_functions.description: Sets the maximum player slots of the server, optionally overrides Config.toml

static_functions.name: SetName
static_functions.description: Sets the name of the server, optionally overrides Config.toml

static_functions.name: SetPassword
static_functions.description: Sets the password of the server, optionally overrides Config.toml

static_functions.name: SetValue
static_functions.description: Sets a global value in the Server, which can be accessed from anywhere (server side)

parameters.name: sync_on_client
parameters.description: If enabled will sync this value through all clients, accessible through Client.GetValue() static class.

static_functions.name: GetValue
static_functions.description: Gets a value given a key

return.description: Value at key or fallback if key doesn't exist

parameters.name: fallback
parameters.description: Fallback Value if key doesn't exist

static_functions.name: GetAllValuesKeys
static_functions.description: Gets a list of all values keys

return.description: a list with all values keys

static_functions.name: Unban
static_functions.description: Unbans a Player by it's account ID

static_functions.name: Stop
static_functions.description: Stops the server

static_functions.name: Restart
static_functions.description: Restarts the server, reloading all Packages and reconnecting all Players

static_functions.name: Subscribe
static_functions.description: Subscribes for an Event

static_functions.name: Unsubscribe
static_functions.description: Unsubscribes from all subscribed Events in this Class and in this Package, optionally passing the function to unsubscribe only that callback

static_functions.name: GetMap
static_functions.description: Returns the current Map Package name

static_functions.name: GetMapAsset
static_functions.description: Returns the current Map Asset reference

static_functions.name: GetMapConfig
static_functions.description: Returns a list of the Custom Config of the current map (stored in the MAP_NAME.toml)

return.description: a list of the Custom Config of the current map

static_functions.name: GetMapSpawnPoints
static_functions.description: Returns a list of the Spawn Points of the current map (stored in the MAP_NAME.toml)

return.description: a list of the Spawn Points of the current map

static_functions.name: GetPackages
static_functions.description: Returns a list of Packages running, optionally returns all Packages installed in the server

parameters.name: only_loaded
parameters.description: Set to true the function return only loaded and running packages. Caution: setting to false will retrieve Packages list from disk, which is a slow operation!

parameters.name: package_type_filter
parameters.description: Which Package type to return. Leave it default (-1) to return all types.

static_functions.name: GetVersion
static_functions.description: Returns the server version

static_functions.name: GetIP
static_functions.description: Returns the server Public IP

static_functions.name: GetPort
static_functions.description: Returns the server Port

static_functions.name: GetQueryPort
static_functions.description: Returns the server QueryPort

static_functions.name: GetCompressionLevel
static_functions.description: Returns the server Compression Level being used

static_functions.name: GetMaxPlayers
static_functions.description: Returns the Max Players configured

static_functions.name: GetDescription
static_functions.description: Returns the Server Description

static_functions.name: GetCustomSettings
static_functions.description: Returns the Server Custom Settings passed as parameter or New Game screen

return.description: a list of the Custom Settings

static_functions.name: GetTickRate
static_functions.description: Returns the Configured Tick Rate

static_functions.name: GetTime
static_functions.description: Gets the Unix Epoch Time in milliseconds

static_functions.name: IsAnnounced
static_functions.description: Returns if the Server is announced in the Master List

return.description: if the Server is announced in the Master List

events.name: ChangeMap
events.description_long: Called when the map changes. This is always called just before Restart event

events.name: PlayerConnect
events.description: Called when a player is attempting to connect to the server

return.description: Return false to do not allow the player to connect

events.name: Tick
events.description_long:
Triggered every 33ms by default

Caution: Only small operations should be performed here, otherwise this can lead to server lag and delays
